sqls.sql: SELECT c1.chapter_index, c1.chapter_name, b.battle_index, r.round_number, c2.character_name, c2.imgsrc FROM tb_chapter c1 INNER JOIN tb_battle b ON b.chapter_id = c1.chapter_id INNER JOIN tb_round r ON r.battle_id = b.battle_id INNER JOIN tb_round_character rc ON rc.round_id = r.round_id INNER JOIN tb_character c2 ON c2.character_id = rc.character_id WHERE c2.character_name = ?;
